title: Missing my Poro Icon
body: Hi i have received my kayle skin but i still don't have the poro icon? is anyone else having this issue???

replies.body:
Sit tight, friend. We're sending them out in waves, so you should have your soon if you don't already have them. 

Let me know if you don't have anything by the 23rd, as *Lew* mentioned.
The gifts are all going out one by one so you should have them all by 9/23.
